DOC.HEADLINE: RUSSIAN INVOLVEMENT SEEN IN NUCLEAR SMUGGLING
DOC.TEXT: German police fear some Russian officials are involved in the smuggling of nuclear material , a senior aide to Chancellor Helmut Kohl said Friday . Bernd Schmidbauer , Kohl ' s intelligence coordinator , made the comment in discussing why police did not notify their Russian counterparts of a sting designed to collar a suspected nuclear smuggler . " This isn ' t an accusation , but rather the point that must be discussed in Moscow -- working together , " he said . Schmidbauer was to fly to Moscow on Saturday with Germany ' s top intelligence chiefs and nuclear scientists in an effort to coordinate actions against nuclear smuggling . Officials in Moscow have denied that weapons-grade nuclear materials have been spirited out of Russia .
